```{r, include=FALSE}
library(admixtools)
library(ggplot2)
```


## Plot admixturegraph

```{r}
plot_graph(igraph1)
```


## Admixturegraph on a map

```{r}
plot_graph_map(igraph1, anno)
```


## All samples on a map

```{r, out.height = "115%", out.width = "115%", fig.align='center'}
plot_map(anno, map_layout = 2)
```
